front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks Virtual Bridged Local Area Network Amendment: Provider Bridging - Remote Customer Service Interfaces

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This amendment to IEEE Std. 802.1Q specifies the use of S-VLANs to provide customer service interfaces in one Provider Bridged Network for customer interface LANs attached to another Provider Bridged Network.
